apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a kiss between two men on Apple devices showcases a tender moment with a light skin tone for one individual and no discernible skin tone for the other, emphasizing the connection between them.  Apple's design language brings this emoji to life with soft, rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, highlighting the gentle lean of their heads and the gentle curve of their lips.  The realistic lighting and smooth gradients on Apple devices imbue the emoji with warmth and affection, commonly used to express love, romance, and intimate greetings.
